casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

April 29, 2014

[Cite as 04129/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-1795.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In re Karnofel.

On February 10, 2010, this court found Delores M. Karnofel to be a vexatious litigator under S.Ct.Prac.R. 4.03(B). This court further ordered that Karnofel was prohibited from continuing or instituting legal proceedings in this court without first obtaining leave. On April 18, 2014, Karnofel submitted a motion for leave to proceed.

It is ordered by the court that the motion for leave is denied.
